ovdesc.p: Country specific validations are maintained in this application. Details such as IBAN, BIC, Bank Sort code to be allowed or not allowed, Clearing code format for each clearing channel can vary based on Country. These definitions are defined in PAYMENT.ORDER.COUNTRY.RULES

desc.p: ID of the PAYMENT.ORDER.COUNTRY.RULES record which is used to fetch the setup for beneficiary based on specific country
The field BENEFICIARY.IBAN in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficiary option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not Allowed' and if IBAN is given in payment order or Vice the Versa, then error will be thrown

Validation Rules: Inputable and mandatory field only if IN is installed. By Default 'Allowed' will be set if IN is installed and country follows rules as per IN.IBAN.STRUCTURE, otherwise defaulted to value 'Not Allowed'
The field BENEFICIARY.BIC in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficiary option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not allowed' and if BIC is defined or Vice the Versa, then error will be thrown
Validation Rules: Mandatory. By Default 'Not Allowed' will be set
The field BEN.BANK.CODE in a PAYMENT.ORDER transaction done using pay through beneficiary option, can hold value based on configuration of this field.
Allowed options are either 'Allowed' or 'Not Allowed'. If it is 'Not Allowed' and if bank code is given or Vice the Versa, then error will be thrown
Validation Rules: Mandatory. By Default 'Not Allowed' will be set
Validate clearing code in payment order based on the clearing channel
Validation Rules: Mandatory if CLEARING.CODE.FORMAT is defined. Null and duplicate values not allowed
Multi value field to hold the list of currencies for which the payment order will be accepted for the country and payment order with any currencies other than one defined will not be allowed.
When left undefined then payment order will be open for all currencies
Validation Rules: Optional field. A valid currency code from CURRENCY application
